metadata.name: Run away
metadata.description:
And in what Metaverse will you escape from reality?

All our lives we try to escape.  We try to get lost in hobbies, in work, in routine, in games and in our own bathroom. 

But a new era of escape is coming, where in your own bed you can lose your head in the digital world.

Had a fight with a girl?  Put on glasses and you are in a fantasy world.  Got huge taxes for an apartment?  Put on glasses and you are in a new world.  Is your favorite series over?  You are already wearing glasses making your way through the forest of magical plants somewhere on the edge of the new Metaverse.

I am looking for my own world to hide.
